name: Minimalist Wireless Headphones
description: Premium over-ear wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Designed for immersive audio and all-day comfort.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your heart rate, sleep, and daily activity with this sleek smart fitness watch. Water-resistant and compatible with iOS and Android.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Comfortable ergonomic chair with lumbar support, adjustable height, and breathable mesh backing. Perfect for long work-from-home sessions.

name: Modern Wooden Desk
description: Spacious wooden desk with a minimalist design and sturdy steel legs. Ideal for home office setups or creative workspaces.

name: Professional DSLR Camera
description: Capture stunning photos and 4K video with this professional-grade DSLR camera featuring interchangeable lenses and fast autofocus.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Stylish genuine leather crossbody bag with adjustable strap, multiple compartments, and secure zip closure.

name: Men's Casual Sneakers
description: Lightweight breathable sneakers designed for everyday comfort and modern style. Cushioned sole and flexible fit.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Set of four handcrafted ceramic mugs, perfect for coffee, tea, or hot chocolate. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Bluetooth Portable Speaker
description: Compact waterproof Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, durable exterior, and up to 12 hours of playtime.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Leak-proof lid included.

name: Yoga Mat Pro Edition
description: Non-slip eco-friendly yoga mat with extra cushioning for joint support and enhanced grip during workouts.

name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical keyboard with customizable lighting and tactile switches for precision typing and competitive gaming.
